title: In-class_exercise 3
text:
Load packages

  pacman::p_load(sf, raster, spatstat, tmap, tidyverse)



Import data and transform

acled_sf <- read_csv("data/Myanmar/ACLED_Myanmar.csv") %>%
  st_as_sf(coords = c(
    "longitude", "latitude"),
    crs=4326) %>%
  st_transform(crs = 32647) %>%
  mutate(event_date = dmy(event_date))

Rows: 55574 Columns: 31
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (20): event_id_cnty, event_date, disorder_type, event_type, sub_event_ty...
dbl (11): year, time_precision, inter1, inter2, interaction, iso, latitude, ...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.




Mapping and Plotting

  tmap_mode("plot")

tmap mode set to plotting

  acled_sf %>%
    filter(year == 2023 | 
             event_type == "Political violence") %>%
    tm_shape()+
    tm_dots()

title: IS415-GAA
text:
Welcome to my IS415 Geospatial Analytics and Applications website. In this site, you will be able to view weekly learning, projects, and notes. Stay tuned :)
Below are some important/useful codes and concepts that can be implemented.

title: IS415-GAA
text:
Important/Useful Codes

print new line (useful for separating codes)

cat("\n")


e.g


    cat("5555")

5555

    cat("\n")
    cat("6666")

6666


list all packages with { package-name : version number }

can view packages have been installed and its latest version


    ip = as.data.frame(installed.packages()[,c(1,3:4)])
    ip = ip[is.na(ip$Priority),1:2,drop=FALSE]
    ip
